title: Kanni Penmai Poove Lyrics Arundhati
stanzas: <div>Kanni Penmai Poove Lyrics Arundhati

kanni penmai poove
Poove poove poove
men nagaithaan ponne
ponne ponne ponne ponne

mai poosum kangal enna
muththaa maynaave.
sorkkalai oara kannaal
pesum nilaave.

thullathaan thullathaan
nam ullathil sangeethanam.
koyilthaan koyilthaan nam
illamthaan birindhaavanam

pookaal en sevvalli
naanamthaan naalellaam
mogaasthiram.

oodal yaen kondaayo
tholikku sollaayo undhan
manam.

thullathaan thullathaan
nam ullathil sangeethanam.
thullathaan thullathaan nam
illamthaan birindhaavanam

yedhedho vandithaan
pen paarthadhu, ival
ennaththil yaar vandhadhu

ennmpol konjathaan
maaman magal
endru gummaalam
kondaaduthu.

punitha penmaikor
thunai serum podhu
adadaa malaraadho
aasai mella.

nilathil sri lakshmi
paadha poo pattaal
arul serum illaththl
vaibogamthaan.

..kai kanukkai
vandhu thodum naalil
anbe seraadho..

kondaattam kolaagalam
ingu vandhaal paar
sendhoranam.

ullangal ondraaganum
naan kooda naan konja
or tholiye,poovai pooththal
vaa maalaiyida

kanne nee manam en
tholai thoda
thandhen malarthaan
un koondhal thoda.

maatru mangaatha
thangam un nenje.
idhupol naan paartha
pennilliye

thiruve vendum
un nesamthaan vazha
thazhuvum kaithaan
endrum vidamaattaane.

pala kanavo
solla vanna kili
naanam kondaadum.

ondralla oraayiram
nenjukkul niththam varum
ullaasam neeraayiram
enenbaen konda varam
paasam or nirangettu
ponaalum bandhangalthaan
maarumo.

jenmam than oru nooru
kondaalum saagaatha
aanandhamo.

koyilthaan koyilthaan nam
illamthaan birindhaavanam
illamthaan birindhaavanam
